title: Sea bass and lemon sole, with beurre noisette and Jersey Royals
description: This is a classic recipe for lemon sole with brown butter, with the addition of meaty sea bass and creamy Jersey Royal potatoes.
ingredients: 200g/7oz new potatoes, preferably Jersey Royals, scrubbed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 x 110g/4oz pieces sea bass fillet (2.5cm/1in thick), skin on
4 x 75g/3oz fillets lemon sole, skin removed
2 lemons, cut in half and wrapped in muslin squares
